files.description: Implements the single determinism policy (seed setting across Python/random/NumPy if available + environment normalization) and exposes a small API used by the benchmark runner.
Provides stable, deterministic JSON serialization utilities (canonical key ordering, normalized floats, consistent formatting) used for repeatable benchmark artifacts and comparisons.
Implements a numeric diff utility supporting absolute/relative tolerances and recursive comparison over JSON-like structures with clear mismatch reporting.
Wires determinism policy and tolerance-aware numeric diff into the benchmark runner so benchmark_case_001 results are repeatable and comparisons respect configured tolerances.
Defines benchmark_case_001 and its expected/actual result production in a way that integrates with the runner’s determinism and tolerance-aware comparison pipeline.

missionDescription: Implement a single determinism policy module (seed setting + stable JSON serialization) and a numeric diff utility (absolute/relative tolerances) and wire it into the benchmark runner so `benchmark_case_001` comparisons are tolerance-aware and repeatable.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
